name: Geometry Dash Remastered
description:
Welcome all to Geometry Dash Remastered, and, well, you already know the game. But this is more, this is 5 new levels you can't find anywhere else, this is ... REMASTERED (I'm totally serious).

In case you didn't know the game (maybe it's possible):
:: Where were you during this decade?
:: No seriously where?

Control
jump >> click, up arrow, space, w
pause >> Esc, p

IMPORTANT !
In case you encounter lag, you can:
:: disable animation (it's disabled by default)
:: Try to avoid Firefox, I like Firefox but my game don't :/, so it is really laggy on this browser.
:: Download the game (for a better experience and less lags)
Play on NG? >> Newgrounds.

ALSO !
I asked F-777 for the right of use of it's music, but he never answer me (since 4 month), so sorry but I don't have music right for now, I ask him again recently, but I don't think he's gonna answer. I hope it's not a problem.

Enjoy the game :D
